# Aura Scouting - Context for AI Agents

Name: Aura Scouting
Type: International Scouting Model Agency
Mission: Connect agencies and promote talent from around the world, bridging Asia, America, and Europe.

Site Structure:
- /: Home page. Contains the agency presentation, gallery of featured models, and contact form for aspirants (scouting).

Contact Information:
- Email: info@aurascouting.com
- Social Media: Instagram @aurascouting

Technical Notes:
- Model images are loaded dynamically.
- The site is optimized to be fast and globally accessible.
